alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH HEAVY RAIN WILL AFFECT WESTERN CHESTERFIELD...SOUTHEASTERN GOOCHLAND...NORTHWESTERN HENRICO... EASTERN AMELIA AND EASTERN POWHATAN COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF RICHMOND... At 454 PM EDT, thunderstorms were clustered over Moseley, moving northeast at 20 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain are possible with this storm. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Bon Air, Mannboro, Tuckahoe, University Of Richmond, Moseley, Oilville, Manakin, Scotts Fork, Chula, Sabot, Wyndham, Crozier, Ammon, Pilkinton, Johnsons Springs, Winterham, Skinquarter, Fine Creek Mills and Roslyn Hills. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm, and may cause localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Amelia; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
